title: Become a Somaeon Host
host-hero-subtitle: Offer your guests something they will truly remember — curated in-home wellness rituals, delivered directly to their stay.
host-hero-copy: Somaeon partners with selected apartments, boutique stays and premium short-term rentals to bring a calm, spa-inspired experience into your guests’ everyday travel.
host-hero-tagline: “Elevated stays. Softer landings. Guests who feel truly taken care of.”
host-1o-text: Transform your stay into more than a place to sleep. Provide your guests with spa-level rituals in the comfort of their temporary home.
host-2o-text: No equipment to store, no planning, no logistics. We coordinate everything directly with your guests, from booking to arrival.
host-3o-text: Wellness experiences consistently translate into higher ratings, stronger word-of-mouth and a stay that feels distinctly memorable.
work-1-text: You include Somaeon in your listing, digital guidebook or welcome materials as an optional in-home wellness experience.
work-2-text: Guests reach out using your dedicated contact line or our booking page, mentioning your property as their host.
work-3-text: A licensed therapist arrives fully equipped, and your guests enjoy a curated Somaeon ritual — with no extra work on your end.
benefit-1: Exclusive host pricing and access to special offers for your guests.
benefit-2: Optional revenue share structure for selected partners.
benefit-3: Priority calendar access during high season and peak dates.
benefit-4: Guest-ready digital materials (QR codes, info cards, copy for listings).
benefit-5: Suggestions tailored to long-stay or corporate guests.
benefit-6: Direct line with Somaeon for smooth coordination.
requirement-title: What we look for in a host
requirement-1: A clean, quiet room with enough space for a massage table.
requirement-2: Basic comfort: temperature control and the ability to dim or adjust lighting.
requirement-3: Clear communication and responsiveness regarding guests’ wellness requests.
requirement-4: The ability to transparently present Somaeon as an optional in-home wellness partner in your listing or welcome guide.
application-subtitle-1: If you feel your property would be a good fit for the Somaeon Host Network, we’d love to hear from you. Please fill out the form below with a few details about your space.
application-subtitle-2: Share a few details and we’ll get back to you personally.
